name: Festive Candy Wonderland Bucket
description: Filled with an assortment of holiday sweets, this colorful Christmas candy bucket is the perfect gift for sweet tooths. A delightful treat for all ages, sure to spread holiday cheer!

name: Jolly Santa's Sweet Bucket
description: Celebrate the season with this festive candy bucket, overflowing with delicious Christmas treats. A fun and sweet way to enjoy the holidays, perfect for gift-giving or as a family treat.

name: Winter Treats Candy Bucket
description: A charming holiday bucket filled with classic Christmas candies, perfect for sharing with loved ones. Make your festivities extra sweet with this seasonal gift everyone will enjoy.
